languages.text:
Allies targeted by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain +20% of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and +30% of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If that ally scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer's next attack is always a critical hit.

traits.locale_text:
Allies targeted by the wearer's abilities gains 20% of the wearer's armour penetration and 30% of their critical damage.
If that ally scores a critical hit by the start of wearer's next turn, the wearer's next attack is always a critical hit.

Allies targeted by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain +20% of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and +30% of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If that ally scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer's next attack is always a critical hit.

languages.text:
所有被装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响的盟友，{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}都会提高，加值等同于装备者护甲穿透的20%与暴击伤害的30%，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
如果被影响的盟友在装备者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始之前造成暴击{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}，则装备者下次攻击必定会造成暴击。
languages.original_text:
Allies targeted by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain +20% of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and +30% of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If that ally scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer's next attack is always a critical hit.

traits.locale_text:
所有被装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响的盟友，{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}暴击伤害{/g}都会提高，加值等同于装备者护甲穿透的20%与暴击伤害的30%。
如果被影响的盟友在装备者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始之前造成暴击，{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}{/g}则装备者下次攻击必定会造成暴击。

languages.text:
Союзники, ставшие целями {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g} персонажа, получают 20% его {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробития брони{/g} и 30% его {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критического урона{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
Если такой союзник совершает критическое {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа, то попадание следующей атаки персонажа всегда считается критическим.
languages.original_text:
Allies targeted by the wearer's abilities gains 20% of the wearer's armour penetration and 30% of their critical damage.
If that ally scores a critical hit by the start of wearer's next turn, the wearer's next attack is always a critical hit.

traits.locale_text:
Союзники, ставшие целями способностей персонажа, получают 20% его пробития брони и 30% его критического урона.
Если такой союзник совершает критическое попадание до начала следующего хода персонажа, то попадание следующей атаки персонажа всегда считается критическим.

Союзники, ставшие целями способностей персонажа, получают 20% его пробития брони и 30% его критического урона.
Если такой союзник совершает критическое попадание до начала следующего хода персонажа, то попадание следующей атаки персонажа всегда считается критическим.

languages.text:
使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}のターゲットとなった味方は、使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}の20%と{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}の30%を1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ターン{/g}獲得する。
使用者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時までにその味方がクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}を出した場合、使用者の次の攻撃は名ならずクリティカルヒットとなる。
languages.original_text:
Allies targeted by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain +20% of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and +30% of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If that ally scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer's next attack is always a critical hit.

traits.locale_text:
使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}のターゲットとなった味方は、使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}20％と{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}クリティカルダメージ{/g}30％を獲得する。
使用者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時までにその味方がクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}ヒット{/g}を出した場合、使用者の次の攻撃は必ずクリティカルヒットとなる。

languages.text:
Los aliados objetivos de las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} del portador obtienen un 20 % de la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} del portador y un 30 % de su {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
Si dicho aliado asesta un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} crítico antes del comienzo del siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador, el siguiente ataque del portador siempre es un impacto crítico.
languages.original_text:
Allies targeted by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain +20% of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and +30% of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If that ally scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer's next attack is always a critical hit.

traits.locale_text:
Los aliados objetivos de las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} del portador obtienen un 20 % de la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} del portador y un 30 % de su {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}daño crítico{/g}.
Si dicho aliado realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} crítico al comienzo del siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador, el siguiente ataque del portador siempre es crítico.

languages.text:
Verbündete, die von {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des Trägers anvisiert werden, erhalten 20 % der {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} des Trägers und 30 % des {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Schadens{/g} des Trägers für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}.
Landet einer dieser Verbündeten einen kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Trägers, wird der nächste Angriff des Trägers immer ein kritischer Treffer.
languages.original_text:
Allies targeted by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain +20% of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and +30% of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If that ally scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer's next attack is always a critical hit.

traits.locale_text:
Verbündete, die von {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des Trägers anvisiert werden, erhalten 20 % der {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} und 30 % des {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}kritischen Schadens{/g} des Trägers.
Landet einer dieser Verbündeten einen kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Trägers, wird der nächste Angriff des Trägers immer ein kritischer Treffer.

languages.text:
Les alliés ciblés par les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} de l'utilisateur bénéficient de +20 % de la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} de celui-ci et de 30 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Si l'un de ces alliés porte un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} critique avant le début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de l'utilisateur, l'attaque suivante de cet utilisateur est toujours un coup critique.

If that ally scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer's next attack is always a critical hit.

Les alliés ciblés par les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} de l'utilisateur bénéficient de 20 % de la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} de celui-ci et de 30 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}dégâts critiques{/g}.
Si l'un de ces alliés porte un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} critique avant le début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de l'utilisateur, l'attaque suivante de cet utilisateur est toujours un coup critique.

Les alliés ciblés par les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} de l'utilisateur bénéficient de 20 % de la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} de celui-ci et de 30 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}dégâts critiques{/g}.
Si l'un de ces alliés porte un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} critique avant le début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de l'utilisateur, l'attaque suivante de cet utilisateur est toujours un coup critique.
